description: Clean, yet very feature-rich Android OS, complete with unparalleled gaming options and tweaking controls. 144Hz AMOLED display, with excellent automatic refresh rate handling and high refresh rate gaming support
It is one very capable phone for gaming thanks to its punchy OLED and powerful Apple A14 chip
165Hz AMOLED display, minimal touch latency, Snapdragon 888+ with a built-in fan ensures sustained top performance for long gaming sessions. Trigger buttons with 450Hz touch sampling
Great 144Hz OLED display, HDR10+, no cutouts, promising battery life and blazing fast charging
